      • createInfluence

        public int createInfluence(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                    throws org.json.JSONException,
                           java.sql.SQLException,
                           de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Prepares a poll which can be shown in the webapplication. Answeres with the id of the created Poll.
        Parameters:
        visibility -
        question -
        type -
        allowfreeanswers - (boolean)
        freeanswersvotable - (boolean)
        Optional - : publish (boolean if the influence should be published in the SN's)
        Optional - : message If the influence should be published via SNs this is the message for the post
        Optional - : time If the influence should be published the influence must be started directly. This is the time when it should end
        Returns:
        Influence-ID and Post-Ids if published
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException

      • changeInfluence

        public int changeInfluence(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                    throws de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        change the configuration of an influence or an influence template using the given parameter all parameter (except externalid) are optional and only the specified are overwritten
        Parameters:
        externalid -
        question -
        type -
        minchoices -
        maxchoices -
        maxdigits -
        maxlines -
        maxbyes -
        visibility -
        allowfreeanswers -
        freeanswersvotable -
        Returns:
        success boolean
        Throws:
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.ParseException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.IllegalParameterException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.UIDNotIncludedException

        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.IllegalAccessException
